title: Wazuh - Cloud Security
description: Cloud Security dashboard provides comprehensive insights into Wazuh events from Docker, GitHub, Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, Office365.

search.query: source:wazuh service:(wazuh-github OR wazuh-google-cloud OR wazuh-amazon OR wazuh-docker OR wazuh-office365) $Service $Group $Agent_Name $Manager_Name $Level
source:wazuh service:(wazuh-github OR wazuh-google-cloud OR wazuh-amazon OR wazuh-docker OR wazuh-office365) $Service $Group $Agent_Name $Manager_Name $Level
source:wazuh service:(wazuh-github OR wazuh-google-cloud OR wazuh-amazon OR wazuh-docker OR wazuh-office365) $Service $Group $Agent_Name $Manager_Name $Level

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

Cloud Security dashboard provides comprehensive insights into Wazuh events from Docker, GitHub, Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud, Office365.

For more information, see the [Wazuh Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/wazuh/)

Tips:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

query.query_string: source:wazuh service:(wazuh-docker OR wazuh-github OR wazuh-amazon OR wazuh-office365 OR wazuh-google-cloud) $Agent_Name $Manager_Name $Level $Service $Group
